      • getValidCommands

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getValidCommands(GameManager gameManager,
                                                         Player p)
        method to return the possible commands of a player in a specific turnstate
        Parameters:
        p - is the player who's trying to execute a command
        Returns:
        the list of possible commands that can be done by the player

      • isAValidCommand

        public boolean isAValidCommand(GameManager gameManager,
                               java.lang.String command,
                               Player p)
                        throws GameException
        method to return if a command is valid or not
        Parameters:
        gameManager - the game in which he's in
        command - the command selected
        p - the player he's giving the command
        Returns:
        true if the command is valid
        Throws:
        GameException - if the command is not valid
